Inline character paste0.

Source: R/plus.R
inline_paste0.Rd

Inline character paste0.

e1 %p% e2

Arguments

e1

first, or left argument.

e2

second, or right argument.

Value

c(e1, c2)

Examples


"a" %p% "b"
#> [1] "ab"

c("a", "b") %p% "_d"
#> [1] "a_d" "b_d"
